title: [CRITICAL] Implementar sistema de orders completo
body:
## ğŸ¯ DescripciÃ³n
No existe sistema de pedidos. CrÃ­tico para checkout funcional y tracking de ventas.

## âœ… Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Crear tablas `orders` y `order_items` en Supabase
- [ ] Implementar `orderService.ts` completo
- [ ] RLS policies para orders por tenant
- [ ] Estados de pedidos (pending, confirmed, shipped, etc.)
- [ ] IntegraciÃ³n con carrito actual

## ğŸ“ Database Schema
```sql
CREATE TABLE orders (
  id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
  tenant_id uuid REFERENCES tenants(id),
  customer_email string,
  customer_name string,
  customer_phone string,
  status order_status DEFAULT 'pending',
  subtotal numeric,
  shipping_cost numeric,
  total numeric,
  payment_method payment_method,
  payment_status payment_status DEFAULT 'pending',
  notes text,
  created_at timestamp DEFAULT now(),
  updated_at timestamp DEFAULT now()
);

CREATE TABLE order_items (
  id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4(),
  order_id uuid REFERENCES orders(id),
  product_id uuid REFERENCES products(id),
  quantity integer,
  unit_price numeric,
  total_price numeric,
  created_at timestamp DEFAULT now()
);
```

## ğŸ“Š Priority
P0 - Bloqueante para MVP

## ğŸ§ª Testing
- [ ] Crear order desde checkout
- [ ] Verificar cÃ¡lculos correctos
- [ ] RLS policies funcionando
- [ ] Estados de order actualizables

title: [BUG] Verificar permisos tenant_owner vs super_admin
body:
## ğŸ› Bug Description
Verificar que los permisos entre tenant_owner y super_admin funcionan correctamente.

## ğŸ”„ Steps to Reproduce
1. Login como tenant_owner
2. Intentar acceder a funciones de super_admin
3. Verificar restricciones

- super_admin ve todos los tenants
